name: RF Optimization engineer (Cluster Owner)
description:
Job Responsibilities:

  • Analysis network KPI and provide optimization recommendations for improvement GSM\UMTS\LTE KPI.
  • Analyzing EPT/site design/Radio Planning data and provide recommendations for improvement GSM\UMTS\LTE KPI.
  • Analysis DT logs and providing recommendation for improvement GSM\UMTS\LTE KPI.
  • Testing RAN features GSM\UMTS\LTE and preparation reports on the results of optimization.
  • Preparation methodology for GSM\UMTS\LTE network testing programs (features, parameters, capacity solution MMIMO etc.)/
  • Network Evaluation, Network Insight, RF Optimization based and tool usage.

Requirements:

  • Understand and master 2G/3G/4G NR technology RF knowledge. Understanding of RAN KQI, network performance improvement methods.
  • Have certain RF Optimization skills - site troubleshooting, network OSS/DT KPI Oprimization, Network Audot/Insight, using Huawei Optimization.
  • Familiar with using Huawei Tool/Platforms as good option (Discovery platform, Genex Cloud, FMA, OMStar, SMART RNO, PHU).

Conditions:

  • Skill improvement, professional growth.
  • Work in the leading international multi-brand company.
  • International team member.
  • We provide contract (9 months).
  • Salary will be discussed with candidates personally.

  • Mobile phone allowance.

professional_roles.name: Менеджер по продажам, менеджер по работе с клиентами
